accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Access to salary information will be granted only under the procedures of the Virginia Freedom of Information Act (Code of Virginia-2.1-340 ff.) or if permission is granted by the Secretary of the Board. Researchers interested in obtaining access to these records should direct a request in writing to the Office of the Legal Adviser, Madison Hall, University of Virginia.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was transferred to the library on 1990 July 12.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of faculty personnel action letters. Topics include elections, re-elections, promotions, leaves of absence, changes of title, special salary actions, resignations, appointments, retirements, selections as professor emeritus, and obituaries.
